item.title: Friendly Eats Tutorial
item.description: This is an example of porting a simple Firebase web application based on JavaScript Firebase API - version 8 and described in a public tutorial to the Parse Platform leveraging an alpha quality JavaScript library included in this example. Complete the Original Tutorial First We recommend that you complete the original FriendlyEats tutorial instructions using Firebase. Adapt the Code to Use the Firebase API Emulation After completing the tutorial, you have a functioning application.
